welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Strathroy-Caradoc, Canada! Get ready to experience the charming small town atmosphere and explore all that it has to offer, from beautiful nature trails to delicious local cuisine. We hope you enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Centralia Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Centralia Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London International Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Regional Terminal
terminals.description: The regional terminal at London International Airport serves smaller airlines and regional flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport by selecting the network and entering a valid email address.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pembroke Area Municipal Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Pembroke Area Municipal Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.
